testsuite.name: org.openmuc.framework.driver.csv.DriverInfoTest
testsuite.system-out: Description: Driver to read out csv files. DeviceScanSettingsSyntax: Synopsis: path= <path> path of directory containing csv files e.g: path=/home/usr/openmuc/framework/csv-driver/ DeviceAddressSyntax: csv file path e.g. /home/usr/bin/openmuc/csv/meter.csv ChannelAddressSyntax: column header SettingsSyntax: Synopsis: samplingmode= <samplingmode> [;rewind= <rewind>] samplingmode: [unixtimestamp, hhmmss, line] Example: samplingmode=line;rewind=true Default: samplingmode=line Id: csv
